RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile O r Over Since October 29 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADY NOGUEZ rallied on the outside to upper stretch bidding widest there clearing late. MAUREENLOVESFRANK prompted the pace clearing on the far turn widening in upper stretch ceding late to wide pressure. POLYESTER BRIDE raced evenly vying from mid track down the lane. SASSY JUSTICE rallied on the far turn bidding six wide in upper stretch leveling off late. SUM KINDA PRETTY tracked the pace to upper stretch fading there. LADRO DI FICHI was always outrun. FAIRY CAKES (GB) pressed the pace wilting into upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Polyester Bride
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, mid track lane, vied late

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Noguez
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Gordiano Racing Stable and Ayon Moreno Miguel
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied outside to lane, bid widest, went clear

ENTRY.NAME: Fairy Cakes (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, wilted lane

ENTRY.NAME: Maureenlovesfrank
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, clear turn, widened top lane, run down

ENTRY.NAME: Sum Kinda Pretty
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied far turn, bid 6 wide lane, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Ladro Di Fichi
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 29 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OVERBEARING stalked the pace vying from the inside in upper stretch dueling up gamely at the wire. CRACK THE MOON pressed to lead on the turn dueling abreast rival through the lane battling to the end. JULIE'S FERRARI chased the pace bidding from mid track down the lane finishing evenly. HAPPY CHAMP saved ground to upper stretch failing to menace. ANOTHER BREEZE was bumped steadying at the break lagging through the turn racing wide to upper stretch. THREE MILE LIMIT led early then was hooked between horses on the turn giving way in upper stretch, was vanned off after the race.

ENTRY.NAME: Three Mile Limit
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early, hooked between turn, gave way, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Champ
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, inside lane, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Overbearing
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid inside upper stretch, up gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Another Breeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped steadied start, wide

ENTRY.NAME: Julie's Ferrari
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, mid track lane, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Crack the Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed to lead turn, dueled abreast lane, battled to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONACOUNTA dueled on the far turn drifting in abreast rival down the lane brushing and carrying foe inside the final sixteenth prevailing. GIO'S MY DAD pressed on the far turn dueling into upper stretch being brushed and carried inside the final sixteenth ceding late. STORY CHANNEL sent clear set a slow pace being hooked between horses to upper stretch giving way there. STEPPINPERFECTION chased the early pace giving way on the far turn. FANG MEIN LIED folded up early.

ENTRY.NAME: Fang Mein Lied
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up early

ENTRY.NAME: Story Channel
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, dueled between to lane, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Gio's My Dad
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed far turn, dueled to lane, ceded in tight,

ENTRY.NAME: Steppinperfection
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, faded far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Onacounta
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled far turn, drifted in abreast lane, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: RNB Farms LLC, Richard Kern & ElizabethKern

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 29 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRODY'S JESSICA surged into upper stretch engaging inside the pacesetter edging clear late. SHELLY THE ROCKET sent clear set the pace angling out past mid track in upper stretch ceding late to inside pressure. RIVERVIEW STEVIE pressed on the turn extending while widest down the lane hanging late. HERE COMES LOVIE raced evenly moving along the inside down the lane failing to menace. LELAWALA was never involved. THE REIGN SONG pressed on the turn coming wide in upper stretch angling in past the eighth pole while fading. EGG NOG was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Shelly the Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, angled wide lane, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Riverview Stevie
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on turn, extended wide lane, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Lelawala
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Here Comes Lovie
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, inside lane, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Brody's Jessica
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged upper stretch, engaged inside of foe, cleared

ENTRY.NAME: Egg Nog
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: The Reign Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed turn, wide into lane, angled in, faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LEFTLANEOUTLAW came in at the break pressing the pace shaking clear on the turn widening in upper stretch holding safe along the inside. STUNNING HERO rallied on the turn bidding from mid track down the lane finishing well. CAB BEEF slow early raced five wide to upper stretch finishing evenly to best the others. ENOUGH ICE slow early raced wide to upper stretch. BALLOT BOX faded on the turn. GUARDIANSOF AUTISM pinched back at the break was rushed to the front being passed on the turn wilting in upper stretch. PISTOL JERRY bumped at the break was far back throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Pistol Jerry
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break, far back

ENTRY.NAME: Guardiansof Autism
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched back break, rushed to top, spent lane

ENTRY.NAME: Leftlaneoutlaw
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in break, pressed pace, clear turn, widened lane held inside

ENTRY.NAME: Ballot Box
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Cab Beef
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 5 wide into lane, evenly to best others

ENTRY.NAME: Enough Ice
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Stunning Hero
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied on the turn, bid mid track lane, finished well

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 21200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 29 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWO BIT KID pressed the pace wresting a short lead on the turn digging in to outside pressure down the lane holding up gamely. CASANOVA KITTEN had an awkward start advancing outside to loom boldly in upper stretch bearing down outside the leader late to no avail. OBIWAN chased the pace angling inside for room in upper stretch weakening after. INSIDE RISK slow early was aways outrun racing wide to upper stretch. VINNIE VAN GO led early ceding on the turn wilting into upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Two Bit Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, clear turn, dug in to outside pressure lane driving

ENTRY.NAME: Inside Risk
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Casanova Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, advanced outside, loomed lane, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Vinnie Van Go
ENTRY.COMMENT: led earlt, wilted to lane

ENTRY.NAME: Obiwan
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, angled inside top lane, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 21200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 29 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ENERGIZER pressed the pace dueling on the inside through the turn shaking clear in upper stretch holding firm to wire. ALLEN CAN DO IT slow early angled inside in upper stretch rallying gamely near the rail. DAVID'S GEM pressed the pace dueling through the turn ceding in upper stretch weakening late. CALL ME LATER slow early played no factor. GREENRIDGE THUNDER pressed then chased on the turn wearing out in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Call Me Later
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Allen Can Do It
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Ronney W and Eastham Richard
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, angled inside top lane, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Energizer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled on turn, shook clear top lane, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: David's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled turn, ceded lane, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Greenridge Thunder
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed then chased on turn, wore out lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOR EL stalked the pace chasing to upper stretch surging clear abreast rival. PHILBIN ROAD hustled along chased to upper stretch angling out mid stretch vying evenly late. CAPTAIN BERNARDO slow early raced four then five wide down the lane giving a mild rally. PAPA DEL CIELO sent clear set the pace being hooked in upper stretch giving way under pressure. KATZ ULTIMO was always outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, hooked lane, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Jor El
ENTRY.OWNER: Warren Andrew N and Warren Rania

ENTRY.NAME: Philbin Road

ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, angled out lane, bid evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Bernardo
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 4-5 wide lane, mild rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Katz Ultimo
